Commands.Concerto: Raises party BRV based on Max BRV  Grants 「Note」 to party for 4 turns   「Note」 increases Attack
Commands.Dissonant Sonata: 1-HIT AoE magic BRV attack  Raises party BRV based on Max BRV before the BRV attack  Grants 「Crescendo」 for 3 turns   BRV potency increases based on the number of active 「Note」 buffs  「Crescendo」 increases Max BRV and grants BRV regen
Commands.Magic Attack All: Slightly raises party Magical Attack for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Requiem of Ruin: Raises party BRV based on Max BRV  Followed by a 6-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack  BRV Hits are dispersed when there are multiple enemies  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV  HP damage is equally split amongst all enemies  Grants 「Note」 to all party members for 8 turns  Grants 「Fortissimo」 for 3 turns   「Fortissimo」 has the following effects:  - Raises Attack  - Raises party Max BRV overflow limit

Passives.Concerto Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using  Concerto
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Dissonant Sonata Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Dissonant Sonata
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed
Passives.Earnest Achiever: Slightly raises party Initial BRV and Attack when HP is at least 50% of Max HP
Passives.Buff Base&Speed All: Slightly raises party Initial BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Concerto Extend: Concerto  use +1When using  Concerto :- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Max BRVWhile  Note  is active:- Slightly raises Speed- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+    Raises self BRV based on Max BRV before the HP attack   Raises party BRV based on HP damage dealt   Increases the percentage of BRV gained from HP damage dealt based on the number of active  Note  buffs
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Dissonant Sonata Extend: Dissonant Sonata  use +2When using  Dissonant Sonata :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 5- Moderately raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Triggers an HP attack after useWhile  Crescendo  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+    Increases the number of BRV hits to 2   Slightly raises total BRV potency   Raises party BRV based on Max BRV   Raises BRV potency based on the number of active  Note  buffs
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Power: Raises party Initial BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Magic Attack All Extend: When using  Magic Attack All , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party Max BRV Overflow limit

Weapons.Anima Flute CP: 35: When using  Dissonant Sonata :- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Raises the BRV Gain based on Max BRV- Extends the duration of  Crescendo - Grants  Small Magical Attack Up  to party for 6 turns
Weapons.Argentic Flute CP: 15: When using  Concerto :- Lowers Action Delay- Extends the duration of  Note - Grants  Small Max BRV Up  to party for 8 turns- Raises the BRV Gain based on Max BRV
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Magic Attack All  use +1Duration of  Magic Attack All  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Wyvern Whistle CP: 70: May equip the EX ability  Requiem of Ruin
